scripts.katex:clean: rm -rf static/katex && mkdir static/katex static/katex/fonts static/katex/contrib
scripts.katex:copy-dist: cp node_modules/katex/dist/*.min.* static/katex/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/README.md static/katex/KaTeX.md
scripts.katex:sync: pnpm run katex:clean && pnpm run katex:copy-dist && pnpm run katex:copy-contrib && pnpm run katex:copy-fonts
